ComicInfo.Title: I Love a Parade!; …Guinea Pigs!; A Message; I Fuck Betty; Corpus Delectable; Two Friends....; Composer's Block
ComicInfo.Summary:
I Love a Parade!: Dennis is in the Gay Day parade
…Guinea Pigs!: Dennis fulfills a twenty year passion and hears a tragic story.
A Message: What woman should do when the guy falls asleep.
I Fuck Betty: Dennis' passion for Betty Page.
Corpus Delectable: Dennis researches an article about necrophilia.
Two Friends....: Dennis' friend rescues a fawn that deveops a strange relationship with his dog.
Composer's Block: How to relieve artistic block.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-01 20:08:19. [CVDB434911] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 23:55:36. [Issue ID 69212]
